product_name: Canari Foundation Shell Bike Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Zip up the collar, keep the chilly wind and weather at bay and show your support for breast cancer research in the lightweight Canari Foundation women's bike jacket. Canari is donating part of the proceeds from the purchase of this bike jacket to the Susan G. Komen foundation to help with breast cancer research. Tightly woven polyester WINDSHEAR micro fabric is highly wind resistant, water repellent and supple, creating a quiet and comfortable shell. Full front zipper with draft flap blocks out the elements and allows for quick ventilation. Rear droptail hem hugs bottom to ensure protection in the riding position. Raglan sleeves offer nonbinding, seamless comfort at the shoulders. Zippered handwarmer pockets and rear zippered pocket stash a few essentials. Keep the elements out with elasticized cuffs that stay securely in place and adjust with rip-and-stick closure tabs. Closeout.
short_description: Zip up the collar, keep the chilly wind and weather at bay and show your support for breast cancer research in the lightweight Canari Foundation women's bike jacket.
